column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: The roadway remains shut down due to an earlier collision involving a tanker truck.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: I-75S traffic remains diverted to inbound Newtown Pike to New Circle Rd to N Broadway, then back on to I-75S.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: Police are posted along the detour route for traffic control.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S AT NEWTOWN PIKE:
column4: Motorists should plan the morning commute accordingly and expect delays.
